vuln:references.vuln:reference: 20160701 Logic security flaw in TP-LINK - tplinklogin.net

entry.vuln:summary: TP-LINK lost control of two domains, www.tplinklogin.net and tplinkextender.net. Please note that these domains are physically printed on many of the devices.
